hadith.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Al-Musaiyab:Abu Huraira said, "The Prophet (ï·º) said, 'No child is born but that, Satan touches it when it is born whereupon it starts crying loudly because of being touched by Satan, except Mary and her son." Abu Huraira then said, "Recite, if you wish: "And I seek Refuge with You (Allah) for her and her offspring from Satan, the outcast
